DOC.brief_summary: SECONDARY DATA COLLECTION STUDY; SAFETY AND EFFICACY OF EFFEXOR.UNDER JAPANESE MEDICAL PRACTICE
DOC.brief_title: Drug Use Investigation Of Effexor (SECONDARY DATA COLLECTION STUDY; SAFETY AND EFFICACY OF EFFEXOR.UNDER JAPANESE MEDICAL PRACTICE)
DOC.detailed_description: This study will be conducted under the central registration system until the number of subjects who meet the conditions for registration reaches the target number of subjects. 12 weeks from the start date. The patients who completed the 12-week treatment with this product will be observed up until Week 52.
DOC.criteria: Patients with no experience of using this product who will be administered this product for the first time Exclusion criteria are not provided in this study
